Package business

Class AdventureManager

java.lang.Object
business.AdventureManager
public class AdventureManager extends Object
Class that focuses on logic related to adventures and connects the business layer to lower ones, specifically the persistence layer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AdventureManager(DataMenuOptions choice)
    Default constructor, which uses either the JSON Data Access Object for adventures with a fixed file or the API Data Access Object for adventures.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdventureManager

      public AdventureManager(DataMenuOptions choice) throws PersistenceException, IOException
      Default constructor, which uses either the JSON Data Access Object for adventures with a fixed file or the API Data Access Object for adventures.
      Parameters:
      choice - whether the user wants to access the game in local or cloud.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if the manager can't be instantiated because of errors in the persistence layer
      IOException - if the manager can't be instantiated because of errors in the persistence layer

  • Method Details

    • checkUniqueName

      public boolean checkUniqueName(String name)
      Method that checks whether the name that was input by the user already exists.
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the queried adventure's name
      Returns:
      whether the name is already in use or not

    • addNewAdventure

      public boolean addNewAdventure(String name, ArrayList<Encounter> encounters)
      Method that adds an adventure to the system.
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the adventure's name
      encounters - an int representation of the number of encounters in an adventure
      Returns:
      whether the adventure was added or not

    • bossMonsterCheck

      public boolean bossMonsterCheck(Encounter encounter, Monster monster, int quantity)
      Method that checks whether the max number of boss monsters in the encounter has been exceeded.
      Parameters:
      encounter - the encounter to check
      monster - the monster to check
      quantity - the quantity of monsters
      Returns:
      whether the encounter passes the requirement or not

    • addMonsterToEncounter

      public void addMonsterToEncounter(Encounter encounter, Monster monster, int quantity)
      Method that adds a monster to the encounter.
      Parameters:
      encounter - the encounter where the monster should be added
      monster - the monster to add
      quantity - the quantity of the monster to add

    • checkEncounterEmpty

      public boolean checkEncounterEmpty(Encounter encounter)
      Method that checks whether the encounter is empty.
      Parameters:
      encounter - the encounter to check
      Returns:
      whether the encounter is empty or not

    • removeMonsterFromEncounter

      public void removeMonsterFromEncounter(Encounter encounter, String monster)
      Method that removes a monster from the encounter.
      Parameters:
      encounter - the encounter from which the monster should be removed
      monster - the monster to remove

    • getQuantityOfMonster

      public int getQuantityOfMonster(Encounter encounter, int i)
      Method that counts the number of a certain monster based on the encounter list.
      Parameters:
      encounter - the encounter where the monster is
      i - the monster to count
      Returns:
      the total amount of that monster in the encounter

    • getNameOfMonster

      public String getNameOfMonster(Encounter encounter, int i)
      Method that gets the name of a certain monster based on the encounter list.
      Parameters:
      encounter - the encounter where the monster is
      i - the monster to find
      Returns:
      the name of the requested monster

    • findAdventures

      public ArrayList<Adventure> findAdventures()
      Method that searches for existing adventures
      Returns:
      an array list containing object representations of all adventures

    • checkCharacterInParty

      public boolean checkCharacterInParty(String[] partyNames, String name)
      Method that checks whether the name that was input by the user already exists in the party.
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the queried party's name
      partyNames - an array of strings containing the names of the characters in the party
      Returns:
      whether the character has already been chosen or not

    • initializeCurrentHPMonsters

      public void initializeCurrentHPMonsters(Adventure adventureToPlay)
      Method that sets the current HP of the monsters in the whole adventure.
      Parameters:
      adventureToPlay - the adventure to be played

      encounter - an Encounter representation of the encounter

    • combatStageActions

      public int[] combatStageActions(ArrayList<Character> adventureParty, Encounter encounter, int i, int totalCombatants)
      Method that generates the combat stage actions of the round.
      Parameters:
      adventureParty - the characters involved in combat
      encounter - the encounter involved
      i - the combatant that should take their action
      totalCombatants - the total number of combatants
      Returns:
      the diceRoll and the damage

      Parameters:
      adventureParty - the characters involved in combat
      encounter - the encounter involved

      Returns:

    • checkBounds

      public boolean checkBounds(int num, int lBound, int hBound)
      Method that checks whether the given int is within the bounds.
      Parameters:
      num - the number to check
      lBound - the lower bound
      hBound - the higher bound
      Returns:
      whether the number is within the bounds or not

    • getCombatActionString

      public String getCombatActionString(ArrayList<Character> adventureParty, int i, Encounter encounter)
      Method that gets the attack name of the character.
      Parameters:
      adventureParty - the characters in the party
      i - the character taking the action
      encounter - the encounter involved
      Returns:
      the string name of the action taken
